keyword: how many calories is in a fuji apple
title: How Many Calories in a Fuji Apple?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a fuji apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and more in a label-style breakdown with quick tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Fuji Apple?
assumptions: Medium Fuji apple (~182 g with skin), raw, unpeeled; values based on USDA data for sweet, crisp variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; organic vs. conventional may differ slightly. Check for allergies.

quick_answer.text: A medium Fuji apple contains about 95 kcal and 4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a fuji apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium Fuji apple.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a Fuji apple?
faqs.a: Approximately 19 g of natural sugars per medium apple.

faqs.q: Are Fuji apples high in fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, one medium provides 4.4 g fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Does peeling a Fuji apple reduce calories?
faqs.a: Slightlyâ€”peeling removes about 5 kcal and some fiber.

faqs.q: How do Fuji apples compare to other varieties nutritionally?
faqs.a: Similar to Gala or Honeycrisp; Fuji may be sweeter with comparable calories around 95 kcal.
